name: Dokopon Choice: Shingeki no Kyojin Vol. 1
name_original: Dokopon Choice: Shingeki no Kyojin Vol. 1
description:
Dokopon Choice: Shingeki no Kyojin Vol. 1 is an adventure game developed by Librica. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Librica.
You can play Dokopon Choice: Shingeki no Kyojin Vol. 1 on Nintendo 3DS.
